Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I need to try and work out the wallet filter/cleaner better .. if I can get that working with txs other than notarisations it seems it can be usefl here aswell.. I have been thinking about a new way to remove old txs, get all txs in the wallet , sort by blockheight and iterate backeards down the list checking for unspents, once you count unspents that equal the balance jjst delete everythig before this last transactio. Seems much safter than the current method I tried, which can sometimes leave a rouge tx that is spent as an unspent n the wallet messig things up.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: do you need two (or more) nodes to run a dealer node that is under heavy use?

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: starting with -pubkey allows dealer node to do processing, and same -pubkey on 2nd node for utxo splitting.   no more required.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you need 2 cores, so it would be possible to setup a single server to run two instances

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: good to know, thanks
